name: SubscriberMainOffer
comment: Maintains a list of main price plans or base plans, which an existing or new  customer can subscribe to.Examples of main offers include:* $80 My Plan Plus with unlimited national voice minutes, 5GB data and unlimited SMS as inclusions.* $35 My Plan Plus with 300 national voice minutes, 500MB data and 100 national SMS
vf short description: Maintains a list of main price plans or base plans, which an existing or new  customer can subscribe to.Examples of main offers include:* $80 My Plan Plus with unlimited national voice minutes, 5GB data and unlimited SMS as inclusions.

fields.name: SubscriberMainOfferSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: SubscriberMainOfferKey
fields.comment: Identifies the main billing offer or price plan associated with the subscriber. //C1 D1: Generated Key based on Subscriber Main Offer Id

fields.name: SubscriberMainOfferDesc
fields.comment: Indicates the description of the main billing associated with the subscriber. //C1 D1: Product Offering.name

fields.name: SubscriberMainOfferId
fields.comment: Identifies the main billing offer that is associated with the subscriber, in the source system. //C1 D1:Product Offering.id

fields.name: ProductCatalogSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: AverageArpuAmount
fields.comment: Identifies the average ARPU , based on charges of subscribers with a specific main offer .

fields.name: VoiceAllowanceFlag
fields.comment: Indicates if the price plan has Voice Allowance

fields.name: VoiceAllowanceQty
fields.comment: The maximum number of Voice Allowance units allowed for the price plan.  A value of 999999 denotes unlimited Voice Allowance units.

fields.name: VoiceAllowanceUomCode
fields.comment: The code for the unit of measure for the Offering Voice Allowance, for example Minutes.

fields.name: DataAllowanceFlag
fields.comment: Indicates if the price plan has Data Allowance

fields.name: DataAllowanceQty
fields.comment: The maximum number of Data Allowance units allowed for the price plan.

fields.name: DataAllowanceUomCode
fields.comment: The code for the unit of measure for the Offering Data Allowance, for example GB

fields.name: SmsAllowanceQty
fields.comment: The maximum number of SMS Allowance units allowed for the price plan.

fields.name: OfferLineOfBusinessCode
fields.comment: Contains code of line of business that is used  to group different business products, provided by the Service Provider. Examples of line of businesses include:* IPTV* Mobile* Broadband* Fixed Voice

fields.name: OfferLineOfBusinessDescription
fields.comment: Contains description of line of business that is used  to group different business products, provided by the Service Provider. Examples of line of businesses include:* IPTV* Mobile* Broadband* Fixed Voice

fields.name: OfferGroupCode
fields.comment: Contains code that is used  to group different business products, provided by the Service Provider. Examples of line of businesses include:*Corporate *Youth*Data Onlyand so on

fields.name: OfferGroupCodeDescription
fields.comment: Contains description of the code that is used  to group different business products, provided by the Service Provider. Examples of line of businesses include:*Corporate *Youth*Data Onlyand so on

fields.name: OfferFamilyCode
fields.comment: Code of additional business grouping of offers - for future use

fields.name: OfferFamilyCodeDescription
fields.comment: Description of additional business grouping of offers - for future use

fields.name: OfferBasicPriceAmount
fields.comment: Contains amount to be paid for the offer on the recurring basis

fields.name: InternationalVoiceAllowanceFlag
fields.comment: Indicates if the price plan has International Voice Allowance

fields.name: InternationalVoiceAllowanceQty
fields.comment: The maximum number of International Voice Allowance units allowed for the price plan.  A value of 999999 denotes unlimited Voice Allowance units.

fields.name: InternationalVoiceAllowanceUomCode
fields.comment: The code for the unit of measure for the International Voice Allowance, for example Minutes.

fields.name: TvChannelAllowanceFlag
fields.comment: Indicates if the price plan has number of free TV channels

fields.name: TvChannelAllowanceQty
fields.comment: The maximum number of free TV Channel Allowance included for the price plan.

fields.name: TotalAllowedDeviceQty
fields.comment: The maximum number of devices of the subscriber/customer that can use the same main offer on the assigned product . If number of devices of subscriber is exceeding this number, new assigned product for this subscriber /customer has to be created.For offers without this limitation will have  value 9999999999

fields.name: MainOfferDetailedDescription
fields.comment: The attribute includes description of allowances included in the main offer. For instance "30Gb LTE internet, 60 international MOU, Unlim Text & Calls "

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
